# astropack

**astropack** is an R package designed to provide a collection of astrology-related computational and informative tools. 
The package supports zodiac sign determination, moon phase classification, horoscope retrieval, and 
Mercury retrograde date checks. It also includes structured data sets containing horoscope text, 
retrograde periods (2016–2030), lunar phase interpretations, and zodiac sign profiles.

This package is intended for users interested in astrology-oriented data exploration, metaphysical research, and its integration into analytical and statistical programs.

---

## Key Functions

| `get_sign()` | Identifies zodiac sign using month and day inputs
| `element()` | Classifies elemental association (Air, Earth, Fire, Water)
| `modality()` | Classifies modality (Cardinal, Fixed, Mutable)
| `sign_profile()` | Provides zodiac characteristics
| `moon_phase()` | Calculates lunar phases and provides guidance
| `next_full_moon()` | Predicts the date of the next full moon from date input
| `get_horoscope()` | Retrieves a horoscope by sign and category
| `is_retrograde()` | Determines if a date falls within Mercury retrograde

---

## Installation

```r
# Development installation (local source)
devtools::load_all()

# To install using Github:
devtools::install_github("mharvey-bb33/astropack")

# To install using Github (with vignettes)
devtools::install_github("mharvey-bb33/astropack", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```
